resources.string:
Start small. Start doing it every 2-3 days instead of every day. 

Have fun reaching your goal. Feel a sense of accomplishment when clicking the widget. 

Build a habit. Remind yourself that you have reached your goals whenever you look at your homescreen.
How often do you want to reach your goal? Every
You have defined goals that currently don\'t have a widget. You can connect the widget to one of those goals. This takes over all its data including the history.
Do you want to show when you reached your goal the last time?
There is no widget for this goal on your homescreen. Add a new widget and connect it to this goal to keep the data.
You have never completed this goal. As soon as you click on the widget, the click will show up here.
Swipe to the next page to find out how to add a widget for your goal.
Long click anywhere on your homescreen until you see an option to add widgets.
Find the WorkoutPixel widget and long click on it. Place it anywhere on your homescreen.
Follow the instructions to configure your widget. \nClick on the «ADD GOAL» button to add the widget to your homescreen.
Have you reached your goal? Click on the widget and observe how it turns green. It will stay green for the number of days you configured and will turn blue during the next night (3:00).
Come back here to the main app for an overview over your goals, to edit them and to view when you reached them.
Go to instructions tab to find out how to add a goal.
